name: Inconspicuous Facility
description:
You and two other prisoners are being transferred by the Imperials to an unknown, inconspicuous facility on another planet. Find out what's going on and why you've been brought here.

CONTROLS:

WASD Keys = Movement

Mouse = Look Around

E = Interact

Esc = Quit

Follow me on Twitter for future updates on my games and other stuff: @omogonix
